by_logging: By logging in, I agree to the
enter_email_reset: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will email you a code to reset your password
please_enter_password: Please enter the password reset code sent to your email
password_hint: Password must be at least 8 characters. Must have at least one for each of the following type uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
pattern_code: Confirmation must be six-digit code sent to the email provided.
pattern_email: Email must be a valid email format.
